name: AlpenCROSS (itch)
description:
AlpenCROSS

The FIRST MOUNTAINBIKE - Nature Simulation Game for PC

TransALP – find your own way aCROSS the Alps.

The challange is to find your best way from one CHECKPOINT to the next. 500m or 10km, explore the terrain!

You get points for sucessful rides. With this points you´l unlock BIKES, equipment, outfits and new sections. Combine it, find your tactics to master the game!

Make more points with STUNTS if this is your way,... but the focus is to drive a Mountainbike with smooth movement, possibilitys, physiks, cycle feeling and – interacting with the terrain!

Your want find out more?

OK, find it, explore it,...

Check out the home of AlpenCROSS

alpencross.farbwerk.at

System Requirements:
Minimum:
Windows

OS: Windows 32/64-bit (Windows XP or above)
Graphics: graphics card (not mainboard integrated) Shader Model 3.0 (DirectX 9.0c or above) is required!
Processor: Intel Core 2Duo or similar
Memory: 1 GB RAM Nvidia Geforce from 6 series, Radeon from X1 series or similar hard disk: 0.85 GB
Internet Connection: only 1x to install! internet connection - to install only 1 (one) time required

Recommended:
Windows
OS: Windows 64-bit
Processor: Intel Core i5 or similar
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660, AMD Radeon 5700 or similar
Internet Connection: only 1x to install! internet connection - to install only 1 (one) time required

Supported Languages: English, German
